topic: Emerging technologies for storytelling in the energy sector 2023
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that current events and trending topics play a crucial role in shaping an effective story hook for marketing content. As a next step, I will research popular news stories, social media trends, and industry-specific updates to identify themes that resonate with the target audience. Additionally, I will explore competitor content strategies to gain insights into successful engagement techniques.

metadata.trigger: If I wanted to make marketing content today, what story hook would I use?
